name: Defend the Earth
description:
You are a veteran space force pilot. A unknown extraterrestrial civilization has just started invading Earth, and now the fate of mankind rests in your hands! Will they be stopped or succeed in their invasion?

Features:

  • Campaign with 5 levels
  • 4 difficulties (Easy, Normal, Hard and Nightmare)
  • Destroy alien ships and asteroids to earn money
  • 6 purchasable spaceships
  • 4 purchasable upgrades

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • Left Mouse Button/E to shoot
